summary: WHILE COMING TO A STOP IN A 2019 GTI SE MANUAL TRANSMISSION WITH EXPERIENCE PACKAGE IN SPORT MODE (WITH < 100 MILES ON ODOMETER) THE CAR STALLED WHILE HAVING THE CLUTCH FULLY DEPRESSED.  THE CAR ALSO STALLED WHILE SITTING AT A GREEN LIGHT WAITING TO MAKE A LEFT HAND TURN, WITH THE CLUTCH FULLY DEPRESSED AND THE TRANSMISSION IN FIRST GEAR.
